name: ZCore
description: ZCore (ZCR) is 100% open source, with PoW (Proof-of-Work) mining based on the NeoScrypt algorithm and maximum supply of 18 million coins. Structured in a robust network with Masternodes and reward of 10 ZCR per mined block every 90 seconds. ZCore is a cryptocurrency with a secure network to perform online transactions via InstantSend and PrivateSend with maximum speed and security.
